identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a high-precision, dark-mode-first QA management tool that feels like a cockpit for engineers.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Linear' app minimalism with 'Bloomberg Terminal' data density.
Emotion: Confidence. Green means safe, Red means action. Every pixel reinforces control.
Content: Data is the art. Charts and lists must be beautiful in themselves.
Zoom In: Focus on the status of the test. The 'Pass/Fail' signal is the hero.

theme.strategy: The 'Obsidian' Interface. Deep matte blacks, not grays. High contrast text.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Big metrics

mono.usage: Test IDs, Code snippets, Logs, Dates

modules.name: Weekly Regression Status
modules.style: Hero Card with Big Progress Bar

tasks_page.style: Linear-style list. Row hover effects. Status pills. Keyboard navigable.

cards.base: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-xl shadow-black/20 rounded-xl

motion.micro_interactions: Active scale-95 on buttons. Hover lift on cards.

images.description: Abstract dark data flow for login background
Coding workspace for empty states or hero

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Implement the 'Dark Mode' class in tailwind.config.js and ensure 'dark' class is on the html/body tag by default.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Use 'Chivo' for all headings (h1-h4). Import it from Google Fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (Collapsible) and Topbar.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: For the Dashboard, use the Bento Grid layout defined above. Don't just stack cards.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Ensure the 'Login' page uses the 'login_bg' image with a glassmorphism overlay.
instructions_to_main_agent.7: Strictly follow the color palette. Do not use default blue for primary actions. Use the defined Crimson/Red.
instructions_to_main_agent.8: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows).

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients. Use sharp borders and deep blacks.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible on dark backgrounds. Use Zinc-400 for secondary text, White for primary.
Spacing: Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' between major sections.
Feedback: Every action (save, delete, run) must have a toast notification.
